narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mildred Martinez is a Nurse Practitioner, Gerontology provider based in Henderson, NV. From 2018-02 through 2018-11, this provider received $143K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 773 beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.4× the national median for 99309 (99309), at $48 per claim vs. the median of $14. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
78% of billing is concentrated in 99309 (99309), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-11, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
